episodes.title: A Message to (Saint) Leah Remini
episodes.description: My thoughts on the A&E "Scientology and the Aftermath" special episode on Jehovah's Witnesses 11/13/18. THANK YOU, LEAH REMINI!!!

episodes.title: Old Papers #2: Letters from Mom
episodes.description:
A few letters from my mother, the first in 1997 and the second in 2000. Here we see a complete disregard for the actual facts of the situation.  She clings to the narratives she has been taught and the script in her head.. what is supposed to happen vs what has actually happened. So sad, and so maddening!

The worst is that there is tremendous suffering on both sides of this equation, and it's utterly pointless.  There is no reason for it, other than a predatory corporation masquerading as a religion that demands complete control. 

18 years later, this same game of gaslighting reel-me-in-then-cast-me-out crazymaking continues, except now I am her primary caregiver and financial support. 

NOTE: I am aware that i am pretty irreverent NOW, and I frequently mock religion NOW.. because frankly, I find it hilarious.  However, THEN, at the time these letters were written, I was not actively speaking out. The "disrespect" and "mocking" she references were simple disagreement and refusal to submit to inappropriate questioning.

episodes.title: Again with the JW family..! (Narcissism Is A Thing)
episodes.description:
How the JWs (inadvertently?) attract and encourage narcissism. Also, I'm pissed off today. 

Psychology Today article: 6 Common Traits of Narcissists and Gaslighters
https://www.psychologytoday.com/us/blog/communication-success/201707/6-common-traits-narcissists-and-gaslighters

Huffington Post article: 18 Ways to Spot a Narcissist
 https://www.huffingtonpost.com/entry/signs-of-narcissism_us_5a26cf6de4b069df71fa196b

episodes.title: Unlearning the "Pure Language" and Stripping Off the "New Personality"
episodes.description: A few tips on learning to be normal... or stopping the JW mindset from sabotaging your happiness.

episodes.title: A Message for my JW Family
episodes.description:
All the things I need to say to people who will not listen.

There is SO MUCH more to say. So. Much. 

I love you, still.
